description: Variation of Condition 28 (to remove the requirement for 2 flats numbers 26 & 28 to comply with one aspect of the lifetime homes standards with doorway opening width of 679 mm instead of 750 mm) of Planning Permission P/2010/2539 dated 11/10/2010 for Construction of 20 x 3 storey houses in three terraces (a terrace of 6 x 4 bed dwellings fronting St Margaret's Road; a terrace 6 x 3 bed dwellings facing the Grand Union Canal, and a terrace of 8 x 4 bed dwellings parallel with Humes Avenue), a three storey building fronting St Margaret's Road containing 4 x 6 bed houses, and 4 flats (2 x 2 bed flats & 2 x 4 bed maisonettes), a 5 storey mansion block building backing onto Trumpers Way containing 45 flats (38 x 2 bed, 5 x 1 bed & 2 x 3 bed) (73 dwellings in total), all with access off St Margaret's Road and 80 residential car parking spaces including 38 at basement level, landscaping, amenity space and refuse storage. Construction of a 3 storey building containing 14 x B1 (light industrial/office) units with access off Trumpers way and 14 industrial/office car parking spaces. Provision of a pedestrian/cycle link between St Margaret's Road and the Grand Union Canal towpath
